references: Related: Ord 7708, Ord 11461, Ord 13242, Ord 19605, Ord 25009
summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of the City of Seattle in the aggregate sum of $400,000.00 for the purpose of enlarging and extending the municipal light and power plant and system of the city, being the remainder of n$1,400,000.00 bonds of the City of Seattle authorized at an election held November 8, 1910 and directing the issuance of such bonds in the sum of $400,000.00 and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
